metadata.title: CVE-2021-30665 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in watchOS 7.4.1, iOS 14.5.1 and iPadOS 14.5.1, tvOS14.6, iOS 12.5.3, macOS Big Sur 11.3.1. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a reportthat this issue may have been actively exploited..

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
